abstract: Sempra Energy, the San Diego utility company, said Monday that Royal Bank of Scotland would pay $1.3 billion for a majority stake in its commodities business.
lead_paragraph: Sempra Energy, the San Diego utility company, said Monday that Royal Bank of Scotland would pay $1.3 billion for a majority stake in its commodities business.

headline.main: Royal Bank of Scotland Takes Stake in Sempra’s Commodities Unit
